widget.name: Chamber Of Fashion Malta Foundation
widget.description: An app which helps everyone who needs any textile items. This App is designed to help especially students who might find it hard to buy certain textile materials and objects. In this app the user can: -Donate materials -Find materials according to localities -Communicate with other users regarding the items
widget.author: Maria Grech and Naomi Zammit Ciantar (MCAST ICA)
